name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior IT Engineer with 13+ years of specialized experience in cloud services and security solutions within the healthcare and financial sectors. Expertise in **Microsoft 365**, **Entra ID**, **Intune**, **Microsoft Graph**, **PowerShell**, and **Exchange Online** to enhance organizational productivity while ensuring compliance and security standards are met. Proficient in implementing **Conditional Access**, **DLP**, **RBAC**, **SAML**, **OAuth**, SCIM, and auditing frameworks to safeguard sensitive data. Skilled in network fundamentals and employing cloud-native solutions using **Azure** and **Microsoft Sentinel** for effective incident management and monitoring.

Hands-on experience with high-performance application development using **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, along with robust frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Proven track record in deploying AI/ML-driven platforms utilizing **MLOps**, with successful model orchestration using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. Committed to leveraging technology to achieve operational excellence and drive innovation.
